# Making Space A Transportation Layer
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/a85ca1996a8dc0d47645b4609f2847c18dae9da5-4366x1942.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/5be82a39defd2805978197686cc0d0d671323379-4365x2922.png?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
• What We Do
We build autonomous re-entry vehicles to deliver cargo from space.
The advent of aircraft enabled the sky to be utilized for transportation. Inversion seeks to achieve the same breakthrough for space. Historically, countries and groups that have embraced step changes in transportation capabilities have been able to set the rules, construct on their foundations, and prosper as a result. We aim to ensure the US leads the way in this new modality, mirroring its pioneering role with the advent of aircraft. We distinguish ourselves from traditional space companies. All our customers reside on the ground, and it is here that our vehicle ultimately delivers its value. Since we cater to customers on the ground, we expect our impact on the world to rapidly expand as we tap into pre-existing markets.
![We build autonomous re-entry vehicles to deliver cargo from space.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/5092c6d57f1c862499ff3738f903d05341a64c9a-3840x2526.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
• CAPSULES
![Ray](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/d2ca6363ead7706db589bf94e52946d84ac32286-2400x2400.png?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Ray](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/406fac8a9c8472e32873d7dd3a8e3db7c7b30a10-2400x2400.png?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Tech dev vehicle](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/fb1ddcc371ccf19c1754b57a69355361ea03c3f9-720x646.svg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Size of ray capsules](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/70c69e1ca23b982292d0bfc4c5639ac8170e4b08-680x680.svg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Ray](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/d2ca6363ead7706db589bf94e52946d84ac32286-2400x2400.png?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Ray](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/406fac8a9c8472e32873d7dd3a8e3db7c7b30a10-2400x2400.png?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
Ray
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/ce150b0ac2eb7395d4112e85eac700071613ad23-2040x810.png?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
#### 1
# Ray
##### Mission: Technology Maturation
##### LAUNCHING: NET October 2024
##### mission duration: 4 weeks
##### overall diameter: 20”
[Learn More](https://www.inversionspace.com/</ray>)
![More details coming soon](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/1705cf853a8ac2cbe7083783a04a0e24c346aaa1-1360x1360.png?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![More details coming soon](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/1705cf853a8ac2cbe7083783a04a0e24c346aaa1-1360x1360.png?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![More details coming soon](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/1705cf853a8ac2cbe7083783a04a0e24c346aaa1-1360x1360.png?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
More details coming soon
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/79316c0c29c73b1ef51823819dbe1fef3e6abdae-2040x810.png?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
#### 2
# Arc
##### Fully Autonomous Global Delivery
##### LAUNCHING: 2026
##### Mission Duration: >5 years
##### Landing accuracy: <50 ft 
[](https://www.inversionspace.com/</ray>)• Use Cases
![<1 Hour Global Delivery](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/97646042b75a78b5e844c6cb2916f546951ebe6c-4912x2760.png?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
#### 1
<1 Hour Global Delivery
![<1 Hour Global Delivery](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/0a71046f2a5bb55a317dba4c451dc6a907c0a8f6-760x760.png?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
What if we could put cargo anywhere on Earth in under an hour? Arc is designed to do just that. This will support national security efforts. 
![Reusable Satellite Platform](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/aeaa1f4904861d80eb9f7cdeb4fbfcc86da83604-5419x3613.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
#### 2
Reusable Satellite Platform
![Reusable Satellite Platform](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/0a71046f2a5bb55a317dba4c451dc6a907c0a8f6-760x760.png?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
Arc will support in-space hardware testing, scientific experiments, and commercial test missions. 
![Space Station Resupply and Return](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/f811308d892533082f6d6518be6db77aaee72509-4928x2768.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
#### 3
Space Station Resupply and Return
![Space Station Resupply and Return](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/aqhlygr6/production/0a71046f2a5bb55a317dba4c451dc6a907c0a8f6-760x760.png?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
Arc will provide high cadence up and down mass to commercial and government space station to help support the growing activity in LEO.

generated_description:
**Inversion Space: Transforming Space into a Transportation Layer for Earth**

Founded in 2021 in Los Angeles, CA, Inversion Space is a dynamic startup on an ambitious mission: to create a transportation layer in space for delivery to Earth. This innovative firm emerged from Y Combinator’s Batch S21, reflecting its potential to disrupt traditional transportation methods much like the advent of aircraft did.

Inversion Space has assembled a savvy team of 28 employees, under the seasoned guidance of Group Partner Jared Friedman. The company emphasizes "hard-tech" and "hardware" in its operations, positioning itself at the intersection of aerospace and transportation. 

### What Do They Do?
Inversion Space is pioneering the development of autonomous re-entry vehicles designed to transport cargo directly from space back to Earth. Imagine a world where delivery happens in less than an hour from anywhere on the globe—a reality they’re striving to achieve with their flagship projects, Ray and Arc.

- **Ray**: Set to launch in October 2024, this capsule will focus on technology maturation with a four-week mission. It's all about integrating cutting-edge technology to prepare for broader applications.

- **Arc**: Slated for a 2026 launch, Arc aims to provide fully autonomous global delivery over a mission duration exceeding five years. Its specs are impressive—landing with an accuracy of less than 50 feet, making it viable for rapid deployment of goods.

### The Vision
Inversion Space envisions a landscape where space capabilities are leveraged for terrestrial benefits. Their approach distinguishes them from conventional space firms; their primary customers are down on Earth, tapping into pre-existing markets that are ready for disruption. By innovating cargo delivery via space, they aspire to position the U.S. at the forefront of this transformative frontier.

### Join the Journey
Inversion Space is on the lookout for passionate individuals eager to pioneer this electrifying intersection of transportation and aerospace. They are building the future, and as they say, "come join us as we make space a transportation layer for Earth."

For more details, check out their website: [Inversion Space](https://www.inversionspace.com). Follow them on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/InversionSpace) and [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/inversion-space) to stay updated on their latest news and career opportunities.
